# Examples

By default, neither code nor results are shown in the PDF.

```{r}
2 + 4
```

Show results by adding `{r results = TRUE}, but not code:

```{r results = TRUE}
3 + 5
```

Show code and results by adding `{r echo = TRUE, results = TRUE}:

```{r echo = TRUE, results = TRUE}
7 + 8
```
